FAQ & Answer

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to the most common questions about our courses, learning platform, and support services.

get in touch
get in touch
Your Questions Answered Here
Your Questions Answered Here
Your Questions Answered Here
Your Questions Answered Here
Your Questions Answered Here
Your Questions Answered Here

Q: What types of AI and IT courses are available?

We offer comprehensive courses in AI Development, Machine Learning, Data Science, Web Development, Mobile App Development, Cloud Computing, Cybersecurity, and more. All courses are designed with 85% practical work and real-world projects.

Q: How long does it take to complete a course?

Course duration varies from 3 to 6 months depending on the program. You can learn at your own pace with lifetime access to course materials. Most students complete courses while working full-time.

Q: What kind of support is provided during learning?

Each student gets a dedicated account manager, 24/7 access to instructors, live Q&A sessions, code reviews, career guidance, and job placement assistance. Our support team responds within 24 hours.

Q: Do I need prior programming experience?

No prior experience required for beginner courses. We start from basics and gradually build up your skills. For advanced courses, we provide prerequisites and free prep materials to get you ready.

Q: Will I receive a certificate after completion?

Yes, you'll receive an industry-recognized certificate upon successful completion. Our certificates are valued by employers and include verification links for authenticity. We also help with LinkedIn profile optimization.
